data.title: 200 Greatest Film Score Composers
data.meta_description: List of 200 Greatest Film Score Composers ranked according to their influence on scoring of films, the acclaim they received for their film scoring, and, to a lesser degree, the greatness (influence, acclaim, popularity) of the films they wrote scores for.
data.text:
